statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_personal_data;
SELECT full_name, email FROM sensitive_personal_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM sensitive_personal_data WHERE postal_code = '12345' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT id, email FROM sensitive_personal_data WHERE id > 5 AND id < 10;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_personal_data WHERE address LIKE '%street%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM sensitive_personal_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_personal_data WHERE postal_code = '12345' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) as total_records FROM sensitive_personal_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_personal_data WHERE address LIKE '%street%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, full_name, email, address FROM sensitive_personal_data WHERE postal_code IN ('54321', '67890');
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT first_name, email FROM users ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT city, country FROM addresses WHERE postal_code LIKE '9%' ORDER BY country, city;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE users.first_name = 'John' AND addresses.city = 'New York';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, street_address, city, postal_code, country FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE country = 'Canada' OR country = 'USA' ORDER BY address_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY email ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT address_id, street_address, city, postal_code FROM addresses ORDER BY city;
SELECT user_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email, order_date, total_amount FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, city, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE user_id = 3 AND city = 'New York';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, orders.total_amount FROM users JOIN orders ON users.user_id = orders.user_id WHERE orders.total_amount < 500 ORDER BY users.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, street_address, city, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE postal_code LIKE '1%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email, city FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE city = 'New York';

SELECT users.name, addresses.city, credit_cards.card_number FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id JOIN credit_cards ON users.user_id = credit_cards.user_id WHERE credit_cards.expiry_date > '2022-12-31';

SELECT users.name, addresses.street_address, sensitive_data.sensitive_info FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id JOIN sensitive_data ON users.user_id = sensitive_data.user_id WHERE sensitive_data.data_id = 1;

SELECT users.name AS 'User Name', addresses.city AS 'City', credit_cards.card_number AS 'Card Number' FROM users JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id JOIN credit_cards ON users.user_id = credit_cards.user_id WHERE users.name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, city, country FROM addresses WHERE postal_code = '10001';
SELECT id, data FROM sensitive_info WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM activity_logs ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT users.name, addresses.city, sensitive_info.data FROM users INNER JOIN addresses ON users.id = addresses.user_id LEFT JOIN sensitive_info ON users.id = sensitive_info.user_id WHERE users.age < 35;
SELECT users.name, permissions.permission_type FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.id = permissions.user_id WHERE permissions.granted = TRUE;

SELECT users.name, addresses.city, sensitive_info.data, activity_logs.action FROM users LEFT JOIN addresses ON users.id = addresses.user_id LEFT JOIN sensitive_info ON users.id = sensitive_info.user_id LEFT JOIN activity_logs ON users.id = activity_logs.user_id WHERE users.created_at > '2022-01-01';
